DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study examine success rate various OneTouch Delica lancet size across depth setting OneTouch Delica lance device . The sample size base 30 subject per lancet size give depth setting . Each subject lance 4 time two lancet size single depth set . There 120 pair lance event lancet size within group . Null hypothesis ( H0 ) : 90 % success rate attain minimum blood volume 1.0μL 28g lancet across depth setting . Alternate hypothesis ( H1 ) : success rate attain minimum blood volume 1.0μL 28g lancet across depth setting le 90 % .
DOC.criteria: Must diagnose type 1 type 2 diabetes least 1 year Must Blood Glucose Monitoring , least twice daily least 6 month Subjects must 18 85 year age . Subjects must able perform task require protocol . Subjects must willing complete study procedure . Subjects must able speak , read understand English understand Informed Consent document . Subjects neuropathy nerve damage hand finger Subjects take prescription anticoagulant one full aspirin per day past week clot problem may prolong bleeding ( person take Plavix daily low dose aspirin exclude record ) . Subjects take prescription medication neuropathy . Subjects hemophilia bleed disorder . Subjects infection blood borne pathogen ( e.g. , HIV , hepatitis ) . Subjects condition cognitive disorder , opinion Investigator would put person risk seriously compromise integrity study ( PI sign case report form subject exclude ) . Subjects work Facet , LifeScan Inc. , competitive company . Subjects miss digit . Subjects pregnant nursing . Subjects chemotherapy . Subjects poor circulation hand judge refill time 5 second
